request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service returns all characters saved in the database.

response.name: Example characters list
Error Access Denied

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service returns one character with the {id} specified. The character shows his movies.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "image": "/src/main/resources/static/img/character-MickeyMouse.png",
    "name": "Mickey Mouse",
    "age": 94,
    "weight": 10,
    "story": "Mickey Mouse is a cartoon character created in 1928 by Walt Disney, and is the mascot of The Walt Disney Company. An anthropomorphic mouse who typically wears red shorts, large yellow shoes, and white gloves, Mickey is one of the world's most recognizable fictional characters.",
    "movies": []
}

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service filters all characters with the specified params: name,age,movies. The order can also be specified.

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service returns all movies saved in the database.

response.name: Example movies list

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service returns one movie with the {id} specified. The movie shows his characters.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "image": "/src/main/resources/static/img/movie-LionKing.jpg",
    "title": "Lion King",
    "creationDate": "1994-06-15",
    "rating": 5,
    "characters": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "image": "/src/main/resources/static/img/character-Simba.png",
            "name": "Simba",
            "age": 1,
            "weight": 30,
            "story": "Simba is the protagonist of Disney's The Lion King franchise. Introduced in the 1994 film The Lion King, Walt Disney Animation's 32nd animated feature, the character subsequently appears in The Lion King II: Simba's Pride (1998) and The Lion King 1½ (2004) as well as the 2019 remake of the original film.",
            "movies": null
        },
        {
            "id": 7,
            "image": "/src/main/resources/static/img/character-Pumba.png",
            "name": "Pumba",
            "age": 10,
            "weight": 200,
            "story": "Pumbaa is a male warthog. He is the adoptive uncle of Bunga and Simba. When Simba fled the Pride Lands, he nearly died from exposure in the desert. However, Pumbaa and his best friend, Timon, rescued the cub and revived him in their jungle home. They proceeded to teach Simba the Hakuna Matata lifestyle, and he adopted it readily. Over the seasons, the three became close friends",
            "movies": null
        }
    ],
    "genre": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Animation",
        "image": "/src/main/resources/static/img/genre-Animation.png"
    },
    "genreId": 1
}

response.name: Error

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. A successful creation will return the movies with its id. Characters can be created together with the movie. Rating and GenreId can be null but characters must be a empty List \[ \] or a List with new characters (no created yet) .For add characters to this list use the request ADD CHARACTER.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "id": 10,

        }
    ],
    "genre": null,

}

request.description: An authorization token is required. You must authenticate before using this service. This service updates one movie with the {id} specified. The successful update will return the movie with its updated data. Characters List can't be update and you dont need sent it with the request (don't write "characters": \[.....\] ). For add or remove characters use the requests ADD CHARACTER/ REMOVE CHARACTER. For update the characters use the request UPDATE in CHARACTER API REQUEST.
